content:
Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a birch boat, I need to place birch planks in a U shape in the crafting table. To make birch planks, I need to craft them from a birch log. Therefore, I will move one birch log from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]
thought: After crafting the birch planks, I need to move them to an inventory slot to use them later. I will move all 4 birch planks to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a birch boat, I need 5 birch planks. I already have 4 birch planks in my inventory, so I only need to make 1 more. To do this, I will use the birch log at slot 30 and put it in the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]
thought: I now have enough birch planks to craft the birch boat, so I will move them to the crafting grid. I will start by moving the 4 birch planks at slot 0 to slot 14.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]
thought: The first step to crafting a birch_boat is to place a birch_planks in the top left corner of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one birch_planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I will place another birch_planks to the right of the one in slot 1. Therefore, I will move one birch_planks from slot 11 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I will place another birch_planks below the one in slot 1. Therefore, I will move one birch_planks from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
